description: The system of 78 mobile barriers has taken years to construct and its design goes back to the 1980s.
title: Venice test brings up floodgates for first time
title_page: Venice test brings up floodgates for first time - BBC News
maintext: Critics argue the sluice-gate system is 10 years too late. Work on the Mose project started in 2003, even though it was designed in the 1980s. It has gone three times over its original budget and resulted in the arrest of dozens of officials, the BBC's Quentin Sommerville reports from Rome.
